high_deck.name: Artifact
high_deck.represents: The importance of some physical object that must be obtained, protected, or destroyed at all costs

high_deck.name: Beast
high_deck.represents: Great rage or passion; something bestial or malevolent hiding in plain sight or lurking just below the surface

high_deck.name: Broken
high_deck.represents: One Defeat, failure, and despair; the loss of something or someone important, without which one feels incomplete

high_deck.name: Darklord
high_deck.represents: A single, powerful individual of an evil nature, one whose goals have enormous and far-reaching consequences

high_deck.name: Donjon
high_deck.represents: Isolation and imprisonment; being so conservative in thinking as to be a prisoner of one's own beliefs

high_deck.name: Ghost
high_deck.represents: The looming past; the return of an old enemy or the discovery of a secret buried long ago

high_deck.name: Executioner
high_deck.represents: The imminent death of one rightly or wrongly convicted of a crime; false accusations and unjust prosecution

high_deck.name: Horseman
high_deck.represents: Death; disaster in the form of the loss of wealth or property, a horrible defeat, or the end of a bloodline

high_deck.name: Innocent
high_deck.represents: A being of great importance whose life is in danger (who might be helpless or simply unaware of the peril)

high_deck.name: Marionette
high_deck.represents: The presence of a spy or a minion of some greater power; an encounter with a puppet or an underling

high_deck.name: Mists
high_deck.represents: Something unexpected or mysterious that can't be avoided; a great quest or journey that will try one's spirit

high_deck.name: Raven
high_deck.represents: A hidden source of information; a fortunate turn of events; a secret potential for good

high_deck.name: Seer
high_deck.represents: Inspiration and keen intellect; a future event, the outcome of which will hinge on a clever mind

high_deck.name: Tempter
high_deck.represents: One who has been compromised or led astray by temptation or foolishness; one who tempts others for evil ends

common_deck.name: Warrior
common_deck.represents: Strength and force personified; violence; those who use force to accomplish their goals

common_deck.name: Avenger
common_deck.represents: Justice and revenge for great wrongs; those on a quest to rid the world of great evil

common_deck.name: Paladin
common_deck.represents: Just and noble warriors; those who live by a code of honor and integrity

common_deck.name: Soldier
common_deck.represents: War and sacrifice; the stamina to endure great hardship

common_deck.name: Mercenary
common_deck.represents: Inner strength and fortitude; those who fight for power or wealth

common_deck.name: Myrmidon
common_deck.represents: Great heroes; a sudden reversal of fate; the triumph of the underdog over a mighty enemy

common_deck.name: Berserker
common_deck.represents: The brutal and barbaric side of warfare; bloodlust; those with a bestial nature

common_deck.name: Hooded One
common_deck.represents: Bigotry, intolerance, and xenophobia; a mysterious presence or newcomer

common_deck.name: Dictator
common_deck.represents: All that is wrong with government and leadership; those who rule through fear and violence

common_deck.name: Torturer
common_deck.represents: The coming of suffering or merciless cruelty; one who is irredeemably evil or sadistic

common_deck.name: Wizard
common_deck.represents: Mystery and riddles; the unknown; those who crave magical power and great knowledge

common_deck.name: Transmuter
common_deck.represents: A new discovery; the coming of unexpected things; unforeseen consequences and chaos

common_deck.name: Diviner
common_deck.represents: The pursuit of knowledge tempered by wisdom; truth and honesty; sages and prophecy

common_deck.name: Enchanter
common_deck.represents: Inner turmoil that comes from confusion, fear of failure, or false information

common_deck.name: Abjurer
common_deck.represents: Those guided by logic and reasoning; warns of an overlooked clue or piece of information

common_deck.name: Elementalist
common_deck.represents: The triumph of nature over civilization; natural disasters and bountiful harvests

common_deck.name: Evoker
common_deck.represents: Magical or supernatural power that can't be controlled; magic for destructive ends

common_deck.name: Illusionist
common_deck.represents: Lies and deceit; grand conspiracies; secret societies; the presence of a dupe or a saboteur

common_deck.name: Necromancer
common_deck.represents: Unnatural events and unhealthy obsessions; those who follow a destructive path

common_deck.name: Conjurer
common_deck.represents: The coming of an unexpected supernatural threat; those who think of themselves as gods

common_deck.name: Rogue
common_deck.represents: Anyone for whom money is important; those who believe money is the key to their success

common_deck.name: Swashbuckler
common_deck.represents: Those who like money yet give it up freely; likable rogues and rapscallions

common_deck.name: Philanthropist
common_deck.represents: Charity and giving on a grand scale; those who use wealth to fight evil and sickness

common_deck.name: Trader
common_deck.represents: Commerce; smuggling and black markets; fair and equitable trades

common_deck.name: Merchant
common_deck.represents: A rare commodity or business opportunity; deceitful or dangerous business transactions

common_deck.name: Guild Member
common_deck.represents: Like-minded individuals joined together in a common goal; pride in one's work

common_deck.name: Beggar
common_deck.represents: Sudden change in economic status or fortune

common_deck.name: Thief
common_deck.represents: Those who steal or burgle; a loss of property, beauty, innocence, friendship, or reputation

common_deck.name: Tax Collector
common_deck.represents: Corruption; honesty in an otherwise corrupt government or organization

common_deck.name: Miser
common_deck.represents: Hoarded wealth; those who are irreversibly unhappy or who think money is meaningless

common_deck.name: Priest
common_deck.represents: Enlightenment; those who follow a deity, a system of values, or a higher purpose

common_deck.name: Monk
common_deck.represents: Serenity; inner strength and self-reliance; supreme confidence bereft of arrogance

common_deck.name: Missionary
common_deck.represents: Those who spread wisdom and faith to others; warnings of the spread of fear and ignorance

common_deck.name: Healer
common_deck.represents: Healing; a contagious illness, disease, or curse; those who practice the healing arts

common_deck.name: Shepherd
common_deck.represents: Those who protect others; one who bears a burden far too great to be shouldered alone

common_deck.name: Druid
common_deck.represents: The ambivalence and cruelty of nature and those who feel drawn to it; inner turmoil

common_deck.name: Anarchist
common_deck.represents: A fundamental change brought on by one whose beliefs are being put to the test

common_deck.name: Charlatan
common_deck.represents: Liars; those who profess to believe one thing but actually believe another

common_deck.name: Bishop
common_deck.represents: Strict adherence to a code or a belief; those who plot, plan, and scheme

common_deck.name: Traitor
common_deck.represents: Betrayal by someone close and trusted; a weakening or loss of faith
